channel.title: Email Registration
channel.description: Looks like from the new login screen that Runescape requires you to enter an email address during registration. What' s so bad about that? Well now selling Runescape accounts will be more challenging due to the fact that you can now recover a password with a registered email. Post your opinion on this great new update (imo, its bullshit :mad:).

item.title: Email Registration
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Lol runescape can fuck off

Read full topic

item.title: Email Registration
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Sanskrit:

They also ask for your email address when you log in now, so you would have some trouble multilogging without getting caught.

Oh… What horrible people then. I think there starting to take this a little over-board with other member’s. Seeing as their starting to get a bit desperate to keep the member’s playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Email Registration
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Indeed,

Seeing as if someone lost their password to there E-Mail and RuneScape account it would of course cause problems. Thus not being able to get the account back at all unless being able to recover it through another plan.

Read full topic
